java/liquibase/database/sql/FindForeignKeyConstraintsStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class FindForeignKeyConstraintsStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007 
00008     public static final String RESULT_COLUMN_BASE_TABLE_NAME        = "k_table";
00009     public static final String RESULT_COLUMN_BASE_TABLE_COLUMN_NAME = "fk_column";
00010     public static final String RESULT_COLUMN_FOREIGN_TABLE_NAME     = "pk_table";
00011     public static final String RESULT_COLUMN_FOREIGN_COLUMN_NAME    = "pk_column";
00012     public static final String RESULT_COLUMN_CONSTRAINT_NAME        = "constraint_name";
00013 
00014     private String baseTableSchemaName;
00015     private String baseTableName;
00016 
00017     public FindForeignKeyConstraintsStatement(String baseTableSchemaName, String baseTableName) {
00018         this.baseTableSchemaName = baseTableSchemaName;
00019         this.baseTableName = baseTableName;
00020     }
00021 
00022     public String getBaseTableSchemaName() {
00023         return baseTableSchemaName;
00024     }
00025 
00026     public void setBaseTableSchemaName(String baseTableSchemaName) {
00027         this.baseTableSchemaName = baseTableSchemaName;
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getBaseTableName() {
00031         return baseTableName;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public void setBaseTableName(String baseTableName) {
00035         this.baseTableName = baseTableName;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00039         if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00040             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00041         }
00042 
00043         if (database instanceof PostgresDatabase) {
00044             StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
00045 
00046             sb.append("SELECT ");
00047             sb.append("FK.TABLE_NAME as K_Table, ");
00048             sb.append("CU.COLUMN_NAME as FK_Column, ");
00049             sb.append("PK.TABLE_NAME as PK_Table, ");
00050             sb.append("PT.COLUMN_NAME as PK_Column,");
00051             sb.append("C.CONSTRAINT_NAME as Constraint_Name ");
00052             sb.append("FROM       INFORMATION_SCHEMA.REFERENTIAL_CONSTRAINTS C ");
00053             sb.append("INNER JOIN  INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS FK ON C.CONSTRAINT_NAME = FK.CONSTRAINT_NAME ");
00054             sb.append("INNER JOIN      INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS PK ON C.UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_NAME = PK.CONSTRAINT_NAME ");
00055             sb.append("INNER JOIN      INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE CU ON C.CONSTRAINT_NAME = CU.CONSTRAINT_NAME ");
00056             sb.append("INNER JOIN  ( ");
00057             sb.append("  SELECT      i1.TABLE_NAME, i2.COLUMN_NAME ");
00058             sb.append("  FROM        INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS i1 ");
00059             sb.append("  INNER JOIN      INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE i2 ON i1.CONSTRAINT_NAME = i2.CONSTRAINT_NAME ");
00060             sb.append("  WHERE       i1.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' ");
00061             sb.append(") PT ON PT.TABLE_NAME = PK.TABLE_NAME ");
00062             sb.append("WHERE      FK.TABLE_NAME='").append(getBaseTableName()).append("'");
00063 
00064             return sb.toString();
00065         }
00066 
00067         return null; // Should never get here, because supportsDatabase will only have postgres for now
00068     }
00069 
00070     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00071         return ";";
00072     }
00073 
00074     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00075         return (database instanceof PostgresDatabase);
00076     }
00077 }
